header: 英语语法进阶练习题（一）

questions.question: If you came earlier, you ______ have seen him.
questions.cn: 如果你来的早些,你也许会见到他。
questions.explanation: might 表示可能性，在句子中表示“也许会”。根据句子意思，如果来的早些，就有可能见到他。因此，选项 C 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: We don't have ______ of it.
questions.cn: 我们对此瞭解不多。
questions.explanation: 句子中的“knowledge”表示“知识”。根据句子意思，我们对此瞭解不多，也就是说我们对此的知识不多。因此，选项 C 是唯一正确的答案。在英语中，表示“很多”的形容词可以是“much”或“many”，但“much”通常用于不可数名词，而“many”通常用于可数名词。在本句中，“knowledge”是不可数名词，因此应该使用“much”。

questions.question: He is ______ that everybody likes him.
questions.cn: 他是如此好的一个人,每个人都喜欢他。
questions.explanation: 在英语中，形容词修饰名词时，如果形容词前面有限定词，则要用“a”或“an”。在本句中，“good”前面有限定词“such”，因此要用“a”。

questions.question: ______ to believe such nonsense!
questions.cn: 他这傻瓜,相信这种荒唐的话!
options: A. What an idiot is he
D. What an idiot he is
questions.answer: D. What an idiot he is
questions.explanation:
在英语中，感叹句通常以“what”开头，后面跟上形容词或副词，然后跟上主语和谓语。在本句中，“idiot”是形容词，因此要用“what an idiot”来表达感叹。

此外，在英语中，句末的感叹号是句子的结尾标点，表示句子表达的感情。因此，选项 D 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: The staff of our company ______ there by train.
questions.cn: 我们公司的职员要乘火车到那里。
questions.explanation: 在英语中，表示未来的一般时态，要用“be going to”结构。在本句中，“are going”是“be going to”的第三人称复数形式，表示“我们公司的职员”即将乘火车到那里。因此，选项 C 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: We'll go there ______ it rains or shines tomorrow.
questions.cn: 不管明天下雨还是晴天我们都要去那里。
questions.explanation: 在英语中，“whether”表示“不管是……还是……”。在本句中，表示不管明天下雨还是晴天，我们都要去那里。因此，选项 A 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: If he were a teacher, he ______ in school.
questions.cn: 如果他是个教师,他就会在学校里。
questions.explanation: If he were a teacher, he would be in school. This is because the conditional sentence is in the past tense, so the verb would be used to describe the hypothetical situation.

questions.question: ______ to the left, you'll find a tall building.
questions.cn: 向左转,你会看见一座高楼。
questions.explanation: The verb 'turn' is in the present participle form, which is used to describe an action that is in progress. The other options are all in the past tense, which is not appropriate in this context.

questions.question: ______ we start, the earlier we'll get there.
questions.cn: 我们愈早出发我们将会愈早到那里。
questions.explanation: The correct answer is B. The earlier we start, the earlier we'll get there. The word 'earlier' is an adjective. It is used to modify the noun 'we'. The word 'the' is a definite article. It is used to modify the adjective 'earlier'. The word 'earlier' is in the comparative form. It is used to compare two things. The word 'the earliest' is in the superlative form. It is used to compare three or more things.

questions.question: ______ is possible to finish the work in two days.
questions.cn: 两天后完成这项工作是可能的。
questions.explanation: It is possible to finish the work in two days. It is a singular subject. So the pronoun should be singular. It is the only singular pronoun in the options.

questions.question: I took a ______ train ride to that city.
questions.cn: 我坐了七个小时的火车到那城市。

questions.question: This TV set cost ______ too much money.
questions.cn: 这台电视机花了我太多钱。

questions.question: He is ______ afraid of you than of me.
questions.cn: 他害怕你多于害怕我。

questions.question: He or I ______ going to the concert.
questions.cn: 他或我将去听音乐会。

questions.question: All he has to do is ______ here.
questions.cn: 他所要做的就是在这里等着。

questions.question: He had two ______ for dinner.
questions.cn: 他晚餐喝了两杯酒。

questions.question: To do this ______ to take a great risk.
questions.cn: 做这件事意味着冒极大的风险。

questions.question: It is too cold here, let's ______.
questions.cn: 这里太冷了,让我们生起火来。

questions.question: It is better ______ than to weep.
questions.cn: 笑总比哭好。

questions.question: We are in a difficult ______.
questions.cn: 我们处于困难局面。

questions.question: You should keep ______ what he is doing.
questions.cn: 你应当留心他在做什么。

questions.question: He grew up in ______.
questions.cn: 他在一个快乐的环境中长大。

questions.question: He is always generous to ______.
questions.cn: 他对穷人总是慷慨的。

questions.question: I remember ______ him a year ago.
questions.cn: 我记得一年前遇见过他。

questions.question: Three ______ died in the war.
questions.cn: 三百万士兵死于这场战争。

questions.question: Smoking will do harm ______ your health.
questions.cn: 吸烟会危害你的健康。

questions.question: I want to buy two ______ eggs.
questions.cn: 我想买两打鸡蛋。

questions.question: You can have those children ______ you.
questions.cn: 你可以让那些孩子帮助你。

questions.question: The picture was ______ on the wall.
questions.cn: 墙上挂着幅画。

questions.question: I haven't seen him since he ______.
questions.cn: 自从他离开后我就没有见过他。

questions.question: He could hardly resist ______ about it.
questions.cn: 他忍不住要想这件事。

questions.question: He was found ______ guns.
questions.cn: 他被发现持有枪支。

questions.question: If I ______ some money, I would be happier.
questions.cn: 如果我有些钱,我会更高兴。

questions.question: The woman ______ is my teacher.
questions.cn: 我与之说话的那位妇女是我的老师。
options: A. the one I spoke to

questions.question: John left the room without ______.
questions.cn: 约翰没把它关掉就离开房间了。

questions.question: Can you tell me ______ in the classroom?
questions.cn: 你能告诉我教室里发生了什么事吗?

questions.question: What is the typical English breakfast ______?
questions.cn: 典型的英国早餐是什么样的?

questions.question: His father is a lawyer ______ profession.
questions.cn: 他父亲的职业是律师。

questions.question: The committee ______ six members.
questions.cn: 这个委员会由六人组成。

questions.question: Tom is ______ than brave.
questions.cn: 与其说汤姆勇敢,倒不如说他聪明。

questions.question: I wish I ______ there yesterday.
questions.cn: 我希望昨天我到过那里。

questions.question: He is ______ of an inventor.
questions.cn: 他有几分像发明家。

questions.question: The writer and scholar ______ dead.
questions.cn: 这个作家兼学者死了。

questions.question: Maria is ______ than beautiful.
questions.cn: 玛丽亚与其说是漂亮不如说是聪明。

questions.question: He'll get into trouble if he often ______ mistakes.
questions.cn: 如果他经常犯错误,他就会有麻烦的。

questions.question: If it snows tomorrow, I ______ not go.
questions.cn: 假如明天下雪,我就不去。

questions.question: Would you please tell me ______?
questions.cn: 你能告诉我邮局在哪里吗?
options: A. where was the post office
B. where is the post office
C. where the post office has
D. where the post office is

questions.question: He has a friend ______ mother is a doctor.
questions.cn: 他有一位朋友, 这位朋友的母亲是个医生。

questions.question: If he ______, where would we hide?
questions.cn: 如果他来了,我们往哪里藏?

questions.question: If you got up early, you ______ on time.
questions.cn: 要是你早一点起床,你就会准时到达。

header: 英语语法进阶练习题（二）

questions.question: He has a big house ______.
questions.cn: 他有一间大房子住。

questions.question: He came to the party without ______.
questions.cn: 他没被邀请就来参加晚会了。

questions.question: The man ______ is Tom's father.
questions.cn: 刚才和我说话的那个人是汤姆的父亲。

questions.question: ______ enough time, I would have finished it.
questions.cn: 要是我有足够的时间,我就会完成了。

questions.question: We can hardly survive without air, ______?
questions.cn: 没有空气我们几乎不能生存,是吗?

questions.question: There are few people in the room, ______?
questions.cn: 室内没有几个人,是吗?

questions.question: There was nothing important, ______?
questions.cn: 没什么重要的,是吗?

questions.question: He was the last man ______ came into the room.
questions.cn: 他是最后进入房间的人。

questions.question: After hearing the joke, I couldn't help ______.
questions.cn: 听了这个笑话,我忍不住大笑起来。

questions.question: How happy she was ______ the party!
questions.cn: 被邀请参加那个宴会她多快乐啊!

questions.question: This is ______ book I lost the other day.
questions.cn: 这就是我前几天丢的那本书。

questions.question: It was two years ______ she had been in America.
questions.cn: 那时她到美国已经两年了。

questions.question: ______ fine weather we have had these days!
questions.cn: 这几天的天气多好啊!

questions.question: He left the room without ______ goodbye.
questions.cn: 他没说再见就离开了房间。

questions.question: The name of the novel ______ attractive.
questions.cn: 这部小说的名字听起来很吸引人。

questions.question: The box ______ Christmas presents.
questions.cn: 这个盒子里装满了圣诞礼物。

questions.question: After reading the news, we felt ______.
questions.cn: 读了这则消息后我们感到困惑。

questions.question: How long ______ here?
questions.cn: 你在这里已经住多久了?

questions.question: He watched the fashion ______ on TV.
questions.cn: 他在电视上看了时装表演。

questions.question: Washington ______ for many years.
questions.cn: 华盛顿已去世多年。

questions.question: Don't speak in class without ______.
questions.cn: 在课堂上没被提问时不要说话。

questions.question: Take an umbrella ______ it rains.
questions.cn: 拿把雨伞以防下雨。

questions.question: Is it necessary that we ______ here the whole morning?
questions.cn: 我们有必要整个早上都待在这里吗?

questions.question: His mother suggested he ______ French.
questions.cn: 他妈妈曾建议他学法文。

questions.question: I ______ my work by five this afternoon.
questions.cn: 今天下午五点我将已完成我的工作。

questions.question: She ______ before I arrived.
questions.cn: 我到达前,她一直在读书。

questions.question: I like ______ you do for me.
questions.cn: 我喜欢你为我做的任何事。

questions.question: He said he had seen the movie ______.
questions.cn: 他说他三天前已看了这部电影。

questions.question: He went fishing ______ the rain.
questions.cn: 尽管下雨他还是去钓鱼了。

questions.question: When she heard the bad news, she couldn't help ______.
questions.cn: 当她听到这个坏消息时忍不住哭了。

questions.question: He ______ his homework again and found two mistakes.
questions.cn: 他再次检查家庭作业,并且发现了两个错误。

questions.question: I wish they ______ successful in the ball game.
questions.cn: 我希望他们在球类比赛中取得成功。

questions.question: He ______ by his teacher.
questions.cn: 他碰巧被他的老师看见了。
options: D. was happened to be seen

questions.question: I can't use my bike because it ______.
questions.cn: 我不能使用我的自行车,因为正在修理。

questions.question: Could you find me ______?
questions.cn: 你能给我找一根三十英吋长的绳子吗?

questions.question: We don't ______ in the bowl.
questions.cn: 我们糖缸里所剩的糖不多了。
options: A. left much sugar to have

questions.question: He is ______ his elder brother.
questions.cn: 他和他的哥哥一样是一个高大的小伙子。
options: A. as tall a fellow as
B. as a tall fellow as
C. so tall a fellow as

questions.question: ______ Chinese are a brave and hardworking people.
questions.cn: 中国人民是勇敢而勤劳的民族。

questions.question: ______ number of people are standing outside, watching the sky.
questions.cn: 很多人站在外边,看着天空。

questions.question: In ______ 1980's, great changes took place in our country.
questions.cn: 在二十世纪八十年代,我们国家发生了很大变化。

questions.question: The village lies ______ of the woods.
questions.cn: 村庄位于树林的东边。

questions.question: He has stayed ______ for several days.
questions.cn: 他已卧床几天了。

questions.question: He left yesterday, so he ______ in Beijing.
questions.cn: 他昨天走的,所以他可能已经到北京了。

questions.question: It ______ very nice if only it were possible.
questions.cn: 假如有可能,那就再好不过了。

questions.question: My sister ______ a thing like that.
questions.cn: 我妹妹不敢做那样的事。

questions.question: She ______ for what she has done.
questions.cn: 她应该为她所做的事受到表扬。

questions.question: This is just ______ they are mistaken.
questions.cn: 这就是他们的错误之处。

questions.question: China is no longer ______.
questions.cn: 中国已今非昔比。
options: A. what it used to be
C. what it is used to be
D. what it used to like

questions.question: We accepted the suggestion ______ we should go at once.
questions.cn: 我们接受了让我们立即动身的建议。

questions.question: ______ his efforts, he failed.
questions.cn: 尽管他努力了,但他还是失败了。

header: 英语语法进阶练习题（三）

questions.question: ______ so great a pleasure that you are here.
questions.cn: 你在这里真让人高兴。

questions.question: We haven't decided ______.
questions.cn: 我们还未决定买哪一个。

questions.question: It was always ______ was blamed.
questions.cn: 受到责备的总是他。

questions.question: The air ______ voices of the children.
questions.cn: 到处都可以听到孩子们的声音。

questions.question: If ______, I'll keep it until you come back.
questions.cn: 假如有必要,我会把它留到你回来。

questions.question: ______ his brother, he has a sense of humor.
questions.cn: 他不像他的兄弟,他有幽默感。

questions.question: She is a good ______, like her mother.
questions.cn: 像她妈妈一样,她是个好厨师。

questions.question: I wish I ______ what to do.
questions.cn: 我多么希望我知道该怎么办。

questions.question: I wish our views ______ so different.
questions.cn: 我真希望我们的看法不存在那么大的分歧。

questions.question: She talks as if she ______ everything.
questions.cn: 她谈起话来好像她什么都知道。

questions.question: It is high time we ______ off.
questions.cn: 我们早该动身了。

questions.question: It is time you ______ to bed.
questions.cn: 你早该睡觉了。

questions.question: ______ put off till tomorrow what can be done today.
questions.cn: 今日事今日毕（今天能够做的事不可拖到明天）。

questions.question: Let's start early in the morning, ______?
questions.cn: 我们一大早就出发,好吗?

questions.question: Whether she comes or not ______ not important.
questions.cn: 她来不来都不重要。

questions.question: They each ______ busy with their homework.
questions.cn: 他们每个人都在忙于做他们的家庭作业。

questions.question: Ten thousand dollars ______ a large sum of money.
questions.cn: 一万美元是相当大的一笔钱。

questions.question: Someone ______ looking for you at the gate.
questions.cn: 大门口有人找你。

questions.question: All that can be done ______ done.
questions.cn: 所有能做的事都已经做了。

questions.question: So far we ______ the first five chapters.
questions.cn: 到现在为止我们只讨论了前五章。

questions.question: Whenever he has time, he ______ and see us.
questions.cn: 他一有时间就来看我们。

questions.question: It ______ who was to head the group.
questions.cn: 谁领导这个小组还没有决定。

questions.question: You ______ and told me.
questions.cn: 你本来可以来告诉我的。

questions.question: The young man ______ win the Nobel Prize last year.
questions.cn: 那个年青人去年确实得了诺贝尔奖。

questions.question: This is the ______ book I want.
questions.cn: 这就是我想要的那本书。

questions.question: The cake she made ______, but it tastes good.
questions.cn: 她做的蛋糕看起来很差,但吃起来味道不错。

questions.question: This girl is ______ of the two.
questions.cn: 这女孩是两位中比较瘦的一位。

questions.question: No sooner had I sat down ______ the telephone rang.
questions.cn: 我刚一坐下,电话铃就响了。

questions.question: I had hardly sat down ______ the telephone rang.
questions.cn: 我刚一坐下电话铃就响了。

questions.question: ______ you ever been to the Great Wall?
questions.cn: 你曾经到过长城吗?

questions.question: I am not well, please ______ a doctor.
questions.cn: 我觉得不舒服,请找医生来。

questions.question: I've a habit ______ late at night.
questions.cn: 我有熬夜的习惯。

questions.question: It's really kind of you ______ so.
questions.cn: 你这么说,真是仁慈。

questions.question: I think it's no good ______ to him.
questions.cn: 我认为写信给他没有多大用处。

questions.question: I have never heard her ______ any songs.
questions.cn: 我从来没听过她唱任何一首歌。

questions.question: She is saving money ______ buy a house.
questions.cn: 为了买栋房子,她正在攒钱。

questions.question: Would you mind ______ your radio a little, please?
questions.cn: 把收音机开小声点好吗?

questions.question: ______ so excited, she could not say a word.
questions.cn: 她激动得说不出话来。

questions.question: If ______ more time, I can do it better.
questions.cn: 如果有多点时间,我会做得更好。

questions.question: ______ you the truth, I dislike Tom.
questions.cn: 老实告诉你,我不喜欢汤姆。

questions.question: Will you let me ______ out this problem myself?
questions.cn: 请让我自己解决这个问题好吗?

questions.question: We must try to avoid ______ the same mistakes.
questions.cn: 我们必须设法避免犯同样的错误。

questions.question: They sometimes ______ on the weekend.
questions.cn: 他们有时候在周末举行野餐。

questions.question: In Kaohsiung, the ______ is usually the same every day.
questions.cn: 在高雄,每天的天气通常是相同的。

questions.question: Yesterday was a holiday, and I stayed at home all ______.
questions.cn: 昨天是假日,我整天待在家里。

questions.question: He is ______ getting up early.
questions.cn: 他有早起的习惯。

questions.question: I get ______ grades in math than in English.
questions.cn: 我的数学成绩比英文成绩好。

questions.question: I like blue sweaters, but my sister ______ red ones.
questions.cn: 我喜欢蓝色的运动衫,而我妹妹喜欢红色的。

questions.question: I ______ fish since I was a child.
questions.cn: 从儿时起,我一直就喜欢鱼。

questions.question: Lesson eight is ______ important than Lesson nine.
questions.cn: 第八课不如第九课那么重要。

header: 英语语法进阶练习题（四）

questions.question: It is no use ______ one's lost youth.
questions.cn: 怀念失去的青春是毫无用处的。

questions.question: They saw many cars going ______ all directions.
questions.cn: 他们看到许多车子朝四面八方行驶。

questions.question: After her children left for Taipei, she felt ______.
questions.cn: 她的子女前往台北之后,她感到寂寞。

questions.question: The ______ of Taiwan is warmer than that of Japan.
questions.cn: 台湾的气候比日本的气候暖和。

questions.question: It's bad for your teeth to eat too many ______.
questions.cn: 吃太多糖果对你的牙齿不好。

questions.question: Children usually want to celebrate Easter by ______ eggs.
questions.cn: 孩子们通常想以涂彩蛋的形式来庆祝复活节。

questions.question: Radio and television are important ______ of public communication.
questions.cn: 无线电和电视广播是重要的公共传播工具。

questions.question: She ______ English when she was studying in college.
questions.cn: 她在读大学时主修英文。

questions.question: This one would ______ your watch.
questions.cn: 这一个会和你的手表很搭配。

questions.question: Weather ______, we will start early tomorrow morning.
questions.cn: 天气许可的话,我们明天清晨就出发。

questions.question: Is there ______ for me in the car?
questions.cn: 车上有我的位子吗?

questions.question: These tablecloths are made ______ cotton cloth.
questions.cn: 这些桌布是用棉布做的。

questions.question: A typhoon is a kind of ______ storm.
questions.cn: 台风是一种猛烈的暴风。

questions.question: He likes to do everything ______ his own way.
questions.cn: 他喜欢用自己的方式做一切事。

questions.question: Nowadays a TV set has become a ______ necessity.
questions.cn: 当今电视机已经成为家庭的必需品。

questions.question: The stores may be ______ 24 hours a day.
questions.cn: 这些商店也许一天二十四小时营业。

questions.question: Before he makes a speech, he often ______ his throat.
questions.cn: 在他演说之前,他常常清一清喉咙。

questions.question: Do you know the process to turn wool into ______?
questions.cn: 你知道把羊毛变成纱线的过程吗?

questions.question: I am ______ to talk to the stranger.
questions.cn: 我情不自禁地想要和这个陌生人讲话。

questions.question: He spoke too fast for me to ______.
questions.cn: 他说得太快了,我无法弄懂。

questions.question: You can buy all kinds of clothes in a ______.
questions.cn: 你能在百货商店买到各种式样的衣服。

questions.question: He has ______ friends, so he feels lonely.
questions.cn: 他几乎没有朋友,所以他感到孤独。

questions.question: Remembering these facts ______ very important.
questions.cn: 记住这些事实很重要。

questions.question: They are ______ the dog playing in the park.

questions.cn: 我也忍受不了她的傲慢。

questions.question: It says that the football match has a very ______ rating.
questions.cn: 报上说这场足球比赛的收视率很高。

questions.question: ______ is really hard to make a fortune.
questions.cn: 发迹真的很难。

questions.question: I am sorry to say I ______ accept your suggestion.
questions.cn: 我很抱歉我不能接受你的建议。

questions.question: I ______ like to recommend you some diet pills.
questions.cn: 我给你推荐些减肥药。

questions.question: Borrowers ______ return the books within ten days.
questions.cn: 借书者应在十天内将所借的书归还。

questions.question: If you don't take ______ suggestion, you'll be sorry.
questions.cn: 如果你不听从我的建议,你会懊悔的。

questions.question: In fact I ______ a job in a dot-com company.
questions.cn: 实际上我已在一个网路公司找到了工作。

questions.question: The bookstore has ______ a night sales system.
questions.cn: 这家书店建立了夜间服务制度。

questions.question: I think you have gone ______.
questions.cn: 我看你太过分了。

questions.question: Is she the ______ student you told me about?
questions.cn: 她就是你跟我提过的那位半工半读生吗?

questions.question: I wouldn't make an apology to him ______.
questions.cn: 我无论如何都不会向他道歉。

questions.question: I still don't feel good ______ taking some medicine.
questions.cn: 我服过一些药但仍然觉得不舒服。

questions.question: Why don't you have ______ mango juice?
questions.cn: 为什么不再喝杯芒果汁呢?

questions.question: You use it to navigate ______ the software programs.
questions.cn: 你用它可以在软体世界里畅游。

questions.question: You should have ______ about it more considerately.
questions.cn: 你应该考虑的更周到一些。

questions.question: That's very ______ you, but I'm afraid I can't.
questions.cn: 谢谢你,不过我恐怕不行。

questions.question: It's tough ______ a personal loan nowadays.
questions.cn: 现在要获得个人贷款很难。

questions.question: It turns the whole world ______ a "Global Village".
questions.cn: 它使整个世界变成了"地球村"。

questions.question: Go straight ahead, then ______ left at the third corner.
questions.cn: 向前走,在第三个路口向左拐弯。

questions.question: They are ______ all the provinces over the country.
questions.cn: 他们来自全国各地。

questions.question: ______ I mean is, it's too hard to understand.
questions.cn: 我的意思是,这太难以理解了。

questions.question: They are getting ______ all the time.
questions.cn: 它们总是不停地上上下下跑。

questions.question: My house is ______ your house in several ways.
questions.cn: 从几个方面讲,我的房子与你的房子不一样。

questions.question: ______ create a new folder and put them in it.
questions.cn: 你最好建一个新的资料夹然后把它们放进去。

questions.question: This is our new product, ______ is Web-enabling.
questions.cn: 这是我们的新产品,是能上网的。

questions.question: I think I'll wear my purple dress ______ the banquet.
questions.cn: 我想我要穿我那紫色的衣服去参加宴会。

questions.question: For me, I go to a body shaping club ______.
questions.cn: 对我来说,我每周去两次健体俱乐部。

questions.question: It is said ______ Peter is an expert on electronics.
questions.cn: 据说彼得是个电子专家。

questions.question: Shall I bring someone ______ can speak French?
questions.cn: 我可以带会讲法语的人来吗?

questions.question: It's lucky ______ the damage is not very serious.
questions.cn: 幸运的是损失不太严重。

questions.question: It's likely ______ they visited the museum yesterday.
questions.cn: 他们昨天可能去了博物馆。

questions.question: Bluetooth is a global standard for ______ connectivity.
questions.cn: 蓝牙是全球无线连接标准。

questions.question: It will be ______ for us to contact then.
questions.cn: 那么我们联系起来就更方便了。

questions.question: I don't have ______ the new experiment.
questions.cn: 我对新的实验不太有信心。

header: 英语语法进阶练习题（十三）

questions.question: Traffic is always very heavy ______ the rush hour.
questions.cn: 尖峰时间交通总是十分拥挤的。

questions.question: My car still works, ______ it is 3 years old.
questions.cn: 我的车还不错,尽管已经三年了。

questions.question: I'm sorry. I thought I would ______ at the last stop.
questions.cn: 对不起,我原想在上一站下车的。

questions.question: I don't want anyone to ______ my database.
questions.cn: 我不想让任何人进入我的资料库。

questions.question: I'm afraid ______ your computer has a virus.
questions.cn: 恐怕你的电脑有病毒了。

questions.question: ______ yourself when you are in America.
questions.cn: 你在美国时请多保重。
